prompts.name: Code Review
prompts.description: Comprehensive code review with best practices
prompts.content:
Please review this code for:
- Code quality and readability
- Potential bugs or edge cases
- Performance optimizations
- Security vulnerabilities
- Best practices and design patterns
- Test coverage suggestions

prompts.name: Refactoring Suggestions
prompts.content:
Analyze this code and suggest refactoring opportunities:
- Extract methods or classes
- Reduce complexity
- Improve naming
- Remove code duplication
- Apply design patterns where appropriate

prompts.name: Generate Documentation
prompts.content:
Generate comprehensive documentation for this code including:
- Purpose and functionality
- Parameters and return values
- Usage examples
- Edge cases and error handling
- Dependencies and requirements

prompts.name: Generate Unit Tests
prompts.description: Create unit tests for the selected code
prompts.content:
Generate comprehensive unit tests for this code:
- Test happy path scenarios
- Test edge cases
- Test error handling
- Use appropriate test framework
- Include setup and teardown if needed
- Aim for high code coverage

prompts.name: Explain Code
prompts.description: Explain what the code does in simple terms
prompts.content:
Explain this code in simple terms:
- What does it do?
- How does it work?
- What are the key concepts?
- Are there any tricky parts?
- What could be improved?

prompts.name: Performance Optimization
prompts.content:
Analyze this code for performance improvements:
- Identify bottlenecks
- Suggest algorithmic improvements
- Recommend data structure changes
- Memory optimization opportunities
- Caching strategies
- Database query optimizations
